AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Suzuran
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: The mysticism and artistry of Higashi, the freedom and yearning of Siracusa. Suzuran, Rhodes Island Operator, has nine times the strength, and the fluffiness.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Angelina
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Green, but full of potential. Angelina, Supporter Operator and Messenger of Rhodes Island, would like to provide help with her amazing Originium Arts.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Magallan
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Many things can happen when she presses that button, but she swears that explosions aren't one of them. Magallan, the Commissioner of Rhine Labs, is glad to welcome new adventures.
